title: Jungle Quinn?
body:
Yay or nay?

I went into a custom with 3 health pots and I survived a normal first clear. (Krugs, Red, Blue)

With a leash I think she'd be alright... Could Quinn jungle be decent?

replies.body: If you kite correctly with her, her clears are extremely healthy for a marksman, if you start krugs -> chickens -> red, you can gank top or mid with nearly full health and then head to blue

I literally pointed out jungle Quinn yesterday or day before (whatever patch day was) and was getting downvoted and told it's not a thing.

Today in 3 different streams I've seen it.
I pointed it out season 3 when she was released. GJ

> [{quoted}](name=shr1ke,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=unQ4gmaK,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-11-28T08:08:19.271+0000)
>
> I pointed it out season 3 when she was released. GJ

Oh don't you worry I've jungled Quinn once or twice in my life.
I'd do Warrior into ghostblade personally. She really benefits from the active on it, and the +20 armor penetration isn't too shabby either.

Doesn't look too shabby, actually. Bit snowball dependent, of course, as are all ADC junglers.

Her ganks after level 6 should be really powerful. Problem is, you'd ideally need a tanky support and tanky top to go along with her.

Build:
{{item:1408}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3086}} -upgrade {{item:3006}} {{item:3036}} with 2 LS quints and Vampirism

Build warrior, ghostblade, and triforce for 30% CDR, and lucidity boots if you wanna cap, (could go BC instead of triforce and boots), lifesteal (BT or mercurial, maybe use bork if you don't get triforce for that little bit of attack speed).

You really don't need {{item:3508}} with her in the jungle due to the mana regen the jungle item gives. I prefer {{item:3072}} or {{item:3812}} for the lifesteal. 

I also like {{item:1412}} for dueling. Blue smite is nice too.

{{item:3046}} again for dueling and for chasing as well

And of course: {{item:3031}}

I found that I don't build ER for the mana regen, but for the CdR it gives. With the Warrior Enchantment, you'll have 40%, which super useful on Quinn for the additional passive marks (1 extra passive mark = damage from IE on 3 crits, not to mention the damage you get from the Q or E).
{{item:3158}} with warrior get enough CDR and again IE and PD gives the crit. Lifesteal is something I enjoy, but if you can do Quinn jungle without the lifesteal then yeah keep the ER.

I don't really like switching away from Berserker's on any ADC anymore - you lose just so much attack speed. Remember, after 5.22, Greaves give 30% AS, which is almost equal to Shiv (35%).

Fortunately, my build is not completely without Lifesteal - {{item:3139}} gives 10%. Together with the quints and Vampirism, that's 15%, 25% against monsters.
